trans-unit.source: Optimal transport for domain adaptation with group lasso regularization, Laplacian regularization [5] [30] and semi supervised setting.
trans-unit.target: Optimal transport for domain adaptation with group lasso regularization, Laplacian regularization [5] [30] and semi supervised setting.

trans-unit.source: JCPOT algorithm for multi-source domain adaptation with target shift [27].
trans-unit.target: JCPOT algorithm for multi-source domain adaptation with target shift [27].

trans-unit.source: Linear OT mapping [14] and Joint OT mapping estimation [8].
trans-unit.target: Linear OT mapping [14] and Joint OT mapping estimation [8].

trans-unit.source: Fused-Gromov-Wasserstein distances solver and FGW barycenters [24]
trans-unit.target: Fused-Gromov-Wasserstein distances solver and FGW barycenters [24]

trans-unit.source: Gromov-Wasserstein distances and GW barycenters (exact [13] and regularized [12])
trans-unit.target: Gromov-Wasserstein distances and GW barycenters (exact [13] and regularized [12])

trans-unit.target: Wasserstein Discriminant Analysis [11] (requires autograd + pymanopt).

trans-unit.source: OT Network Simplex solver for the linear program/ Earth Movers Distance [1] .
trans-unit.target: OT Network Simplex solver for the linear program/ Earth Movers Distance [1] .

trans-unit.source: Smooth optimal transport solvers (dual and semi-dual) for KL and squared L2 regularizations [17].
trans-unit.target: Smooth optimal transport solvers (dual and semi-dual) for KL and squared L2 regularizations [17].

trans-unit.source: Conditional gradient [6] and Generalized conditional gradient for regularized OT [7].
trans-unit.target: Conditional gradient [6] and Generalized conditional gradient for regularized OT [7].

trans-unit.source: Stochastic solver for Large-scale Optimal Transport (semi-dual problem [18] and dual problem [19])
trans-unit.target: Stochastic solver for Large-scale Optimal Transport (semi-dual problem [18] and dual problem [19])

trans-unit.source: Unbalanced OT with KL relaxation and barycenter [10, 25].
trans-unit.target: Unbalanced OT with KL relaxation and barycenter [10, 25].

trans-unit.target: Partial Wasserstein and Gromov-Wasserstein (exact [29] and entropic [3] formulations).

trans-unit.source: The examples folder contain several examples and use case for the library. The full documentation with examples and output is available on https://PythonOT.github.io/.
trans-unit.target: The examples folder contain several examples and use case for the library. The full documentation with examples and output is available on https://PythonOT.github.io/.

trans-unit.source: The library has been tested on Linux, MacOSX and Windows. It requires a C++ compiler for building/installing the EMD solver and relies on the following Python modules:
trans-unit.target: La biblioteca ha sido probada en Linux,MacOSX y Windows.Requiere un compilador C++para construir/instalar el solucionador EMD y se basa en los siguientes módulos de Python:

trans-unit.source: This open source Python library provide several solvers for optimization problems related to Optimal Transport for signal, image processing and machine learning.
trans-unit.target: Esta biblioteca Python de código abierto proporciona varios solucionadores de problemas de optimización relacionados con el Transporte Óptimo para la señal,el procesamiento de imágenes y el aprendizaje de la máquina.

trans-unit.source: This toolbox benefit a lot from open source research and we would like to thank the following persons for providing some code (in various languages):
trans-unit.target: Esta caja de herramientas se beneficia mucho de la investigación sobre el código abierto y quisiéramos agradecer a las siguientes personas por proporcionarnos algo de código (en varios idiomas):

trans-unit.target: o conseguir la última versión corriendo:
